definition: sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)
item/component/classifier for events, things, clothes etc

sentences.english: The service takes a string and returns the audio file as an attachment.
sentences.chinese: 這個服務接收字符串並將音頻文件作爲一個附件返回。

sentences.english: Teach user with predefined transcript and from audio file.
sentences.chinese: 用戶預定義教成績單和音頻文件。

sentences.english: It takes a lot of resource to generate a sizable amount of data to represent an audio file.
sentences.chinese: 生成大量數據以代表一個音頻文件需要耗費許多資源。

sentences.english: This course has audio files that are stored on a computer or on a CD.
sentences.chinese: 本課程有儲存在電腦或光盤上的音頻文件。

sentences.english: Automatically upload the audio file to a network location for processing.
sentences.chinese: 自動將音頻文件上傳到網絡位置以便處理。

sentences.english: Put a voice on your job-search profile.
sentences.chinese: 在你的求職文件中放上一份音頻文件。

sentences.english: The first line gets the path of the audio file.
sentences.chinese: 第一行是獲取音頻文件路徑。

sentences.english: WAV, Import audio files, audio wave mapping.
sentences.chinese: 導入音頻文件，繪出音頻波形圖。

sentences.english: FM is the world's largest audio-archive focussed on electronic music.
sentences.chinese: FM是世界上最大的致力於電子音樂的音頻文件庫。

sentences.english: View Hecht's audio slideshow on the project here.
sentences.chinese: 此處查看赫特的幻燈片音頻文件。

sentences.english: This will also work for audio files such as FLAC , APE or musepack.
sentences.chinese: 這也將工作，如後手，超支或千千音頻文件。

sentences.english: A podcast can be easily created from a digital audio file.
sentences.chinese: 泡播很容易從數字音頻文件生成。

sentences.english: He has also started recording phone conversations and meetings to store as audio files.
sentences.chinese: 他還起頭以音頻文件記實電話談話和會議實況。
